body:
Hello. As you may have already figured out, I am somewhat new to the server. I found out about the server quite a while ago but never really played on it. But now I'm back and the server is really exciting to play on, except the fact it times out a lot.

But I'm pretty ok at PvP and somewhat godly with a bow :P 

I guess I'll see some of you on the server ;)

title: Hey, I'm alpal!

replies.body: Hey there, whalecome (back) to Avicus! I look forward to playing with you, especially with bow fights :D

replies.body:
Hey, welcome to Avicus and the forums!
If you're having time-out issues, try using a different version of Minecraft. 1.7.4 or 1.7.5 seem to work pretty well (I'm assuming you're using 1.7.10. When I switched from 1.7.10 to another version, I stopped timing out).
replies.body_tagged:
Hey, welcome to Avicus and the forums!
If you're having time-out issues, try using a different version of Minecraft. 1.7.4 or 1.7.5 seem to work pretty well (I'm assuming you're using 1.7.10. When I switched from 1.7.10 to another version, I stopped timing out).

replies.body:
Welcome back to the Avicus forums and itself! ^_^ 

If you have any questions or concerns, ask a staff member like me or any experienced member of the community! :D 
If you wanna just have fun while playing, hop onto our TS!

replies.body:
Welcome back to Avicus!
Don't worry about you being timed out, it is happening to a lot of players. It will hopefully be fixed soon so you can enjoy your gameplay. :)
